names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Semen Sesame Nigrum Semen Sesame Indici

action.primary: Nourishes and fortifies Liver and Kidney Yin

indications: Kidney and Liver Yin Deficiency with blurred vision, tinnitus and dizziness
Aids in recovery from severe illness
Increases the quantity of breast milk

action.primary: Nourishes Jing and Blood and extinguishes Wind

indications: Headaches, dizziness and numbness due to Blood Deficiency or Yin Deficiency
Especially for dizziness that worsens with activity

action.primary: Moistens and lubricates the Intestines and Lungs

indications: Constipation due to Dry intestines or Blood Deficiency

contraindications: Contraindicated in those with diarrhea due to Spleen Deficiency.
Use with caution for those with toothache from Rising Fire.

useCases: Dizziness, blurred vision, tinnitus and headache due to Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with ascendant Yang.
Exhausted Kidneys and Liver with premature graying of the hair, dizziness, a weak lower back and frequent nocturia.
Lower back and leg pain due to Wind-Damp Bi.
As a tincture for Wind-Damp Bi in the elderly or debilitated with generalized weakness and lower back and leg pain.
Insufficient lactation due to Blood Deficiency.

notes: It moistens dry tissues for dry coughs and dry Intestines.
The oil is applied topically to the head for migraines and vertigo.
It treats sores and insect bites when crushed and applied topically.
Sesame oil, when applied topically treats acute burns.
This herb brightens the eyes, blackens the hair, moistens the skin and lubricates the Intestines.
Sesame Oil (Oleum Sesame) Xiang Yu is used as a base for herbal powders.

Both Hei Zhi Ma and Fr. Mori #{SangShen} Sang Shen serve as food as well as medicinals, both tonify the Liver and Kidneys, enrich Yin, augment the Blood, moisten Dryness and lubricate the Intestines. Hei Zhi Ma is neutral, enters the Kidneys to replenish the essence and augment the marrow. Sang Shen is cool, enters the Blood Level and secondarily tonifies the Kidneys.
Dry-fried Sesame Seeds Chao Hei Zhi Ma have an enhanced ability ability to augment the Liver and Kidneys, replenish essence and Blood, lubricate the Intestines and treat constipation.
